hackathon-description-text: THack São Paulo is Tnooz's first stop in South America for it's global travel hackathon series.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best project by individual or team of up to two members
Best project by team of three to five members
Best project as selected by THack developers
Members of team project voted best use of Sabre API will each win a pair of Beats by Dre headphones.

One team will be invited to pitch its idea during Seedstars Brazil startup pitch contest in December. Winner of Brazil contest will receive expense-paid trip to global Seedstars startup pitch event in Switzerland in February 2016 and potential to earn US$1.5 million in investment.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Invitation to pitch at Seedstars Brazil

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Avenida Nova Independência, 1064 - Brooklin Paulista, São Paulo - SP, 04570-001, Brazil

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: New idea and approach compared to "how it's done" in the market today
Functional and coded digital travel application
Execution of project meets one or more THack challenge
Team clearly solves a problem or pain point in travel and explains clearly in its demo how the project does so

hackathon-location-address: Avenida Nova Independência, 1064 - Brooklin Paulista, São Paulo - SP, 04570-001, Brazil
hackathon-description-header: Create apps and digital tools that wow travelers and improve their user experience.
